description.value:
Prerequisite: 21st level, tiefling

Benefit: While a creature is marked by you, it has vulnerable 5 fire against your attack powers.

Update (6/14/2010)

Replace the Benefit entry with the following text: "While a creature is marked by you, it has vulnerable 5 fire against your attack powers."

Published in Player's Handbook Races: Tiefling, page(s) 28.
